summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Calm Water Gel Moisturizer is a weightless, hyaluronic acid water-gel that hydrates dry, sensitive skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGives dry, balanced or sensitive skin the moisture it cravesRefreshing gel formula transforms into a skin-quenching fluid upon application, forming a weightless barrier on the skinDual hyaluronic acid technology immediately hydrates dry, irritated skin and locks in moistureBest for those concerned with redness, dryness, dullness and uneven textureKey IngredientsApple Fruit Extract and Glycerin: helps soften skinHyaluronic Acid: deeply hydrates dry, parched skinCactus Pear: helps soothe sensitive skinResearch ResultsIncreases skin hydration by 1094% immediately after applicationIncreases skin hydration by 67%, even 8 hours after applicationDecreases water loss by 389%, even 8 hours after applicationItem 2520748How To UseSqueeze a small amount into palm and rub hands together to activate. Pat gently onto face and neck. Use twice a day for continuous relief.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Diethylhexyl Carbonate, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Stearyl Heptanoate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sea Salt, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Stearyl Caprylate, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium Phosphate, Linalool, Limonene.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Squeeze a small amount into palm and rub hands together to activate. Pat gently onto face and neck. Use twice a day for continuous relief.

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: My daughter has tried countless moisturizer and this is the only one that works for her extremely sensitive skin. I used it when I had a dermatitis flare up and it was amazing. It is lightweight and nourishing and smells like a spa. We will always be purchasing this for my daughter's skin.

reviews.headline: Gentle and does its job well
reviews.comments: My skin has always been "bad."  I always had "acne," redness, greasy yet dry skin. This system from Dermalogica gave me the skin I never knew could happen. It took me over 30 years to figure out that my skin was always irritated from products and was not the acne I thought it was.  This has been my go to moisturizer for the last 8 years. It is light weight, moisturizes amazingly and does not irritate my skin.

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I have issues with dry spots and acne. Definition of combination skin. This moisturizer has not only never broken me out but also helped my skin survive through a couple colds now where usually my nose would get very dry from tissues.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Been using this product for the last 4yrs. This  gives my skin relief when my rosacea acts up. Love this product.

reviews.headline: yes I would by this product again
reviews.comments: this product so smooth on my face .

reviews.headline: Over priced for what it is.
reviews.comments: This really isnt a bad product, but the price point is ridiculous for the size. It is a light non-greasy formula, i saw no "calming properties". Any fragrance free lotion from a less expensive brand is just as good, such as Neutrogena.

reviews.headline: Fungal acne safe, but hate the scent
reviews.comments: There are so few moisturizers on the market that don't irritate/feed fungal acne, and I was very happy to see that this one was, which is why I purchased it! But the scent was so strong that I genuinely had to wash it off.

reviews.headline: Cooling, soothing, smells great
reviews.comments: Does not bother my very sensitive skin.  Very moisturizing great for summer.

reviews.headline: Caused a massive breakout
reviews.comments: Everyones skin is different - but I was shocked at how this irritated mine. I have sensitive/rosecea / dry skin, but do not have acne at all. I use other Derm products and like them so I got this and the Sensitive Skin cleanser. After two days my skin started to feel really irritated and day 3 I woke up with my entire face broken out. This is the worst breakout I have had in my life. I was hopeful due to the brand and it being made for sensitive/ red skin but it has wrecked mine pretty badly. Just a caution - again everyone is different!

reviews.headline: NOT HYDRATING
reviews.comments: Formulation is similar to neutrogenas hydroboast. Definietly not hydrating during winter months - hopefully it will be during the summer months. Very weightless almost watery formula. If you have dry/combo skin i wouldnt recommend.

reviews.headline: Bigger size
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer! I'ts just very small for the price of it

reviews.headline: Second tube I've purchased. Very nice!
reviews.comments: Great for sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Good lightweight moisturizer
reviews.comments:
This is a great lightweight moisturizer for under
Makeup.

reviews.headline: I've used this for years.
reviews.comments: I have been very happy with Calm Water Gel, and have used it on my rosacea and eczema prone skin for several years.  It feels cooling and helps my facial meds to sink in.  I love it, and won't use any other facial moisturizer.  I'd recommend it to anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I use this as a part of my daily skin care routine. Love how it goes in and makes my skin feel.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer for PALMS!
reviews.comments: This moisturerizer is greatâ€¦. IF you can get it on your face.  You have to rub it between your palms to activate/emulsify the gel but "patting" it on face with my palms is so ridiculously challenging.  I end up using 2-3x more product cuz most of it absorbs into my palms.

reviews.headline: 100% happy with this product!!
reviews.comments: This product has been extremely helpful with my rosacea. I had been dealing with extreme dryness and flaky spots and this has totally hydrated my entire face. I also loved how it cools your face as you pat it on. Simply amazing!!!

reviews.headline: Clogs pores
reviews.comments: I bought this because an aesthetician used it on my skin during a facial, and I loved the feel and smell of it. Unfortunately, after using this for a few weeks, I have noticed that my pores are very clogged, and my skin is quite oily, even at age 57. I want to love it because it feels and smells great, but it just doesn't work for my skin.

reviews.headline: I like it
reviews.comments: I will only use this moisturer in the morning since it's really light and sometimes it can be hard to abore but it's still a good product!

reviews.headline: Amazing for mega sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This is a godsend. I have the most sensitive, dehydrated skin in the world and this stuff has worked miracles. I use it on top of hyaluronic acid and my complexion has never looked better. I also use Dermalogica toning spray underneath those two, and spray a little bit on at intervals throughout the day. This is a watery gel so a little goes a long way.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This product really surprised me.... out of the tube, it feels really light and watery, like it wouldn't do anything for you, but once you put it on your face, it immediately sinks in... you really do get that plumping feeling that other products say they do, but don't. I have extremely dry skin from using retin-a for the last couple years, and I normally moisturize with three products; a water gel, a regular moisturizer, and an oil to seal the moisture in.... I've been through so many high end moisturizers, and at the end of my day, I always feel a little dry. This product moisturizes like a dream.... I don't have to fallow up with anything else. It's very lightweight, does not leave the skin greasy, and does not sting my face like other hylouronic acid gels usually do to me. I will say that this item is pretty pricey, however, you really don't need a lot. My previous holy grail water gel cream was the Peter Thomas Roth cream cloud, however I had to use a lot more of that each time to apply. This is not like that. A pea sized amount will moisturize your whole face. I'm very impressed with this and until now didn't know a moisturizer like this existed. I think this product would be great for all skin types. It's lightweight for oily skin, but hydrates very well for dry skin. There is also not really a scent to this, so sensitive skin would like this as well. Definitely my new holy grail. Works excellent under makeup since it is water based. Really am enjoying this a lot more than I thought I would just based on the texture of the gel. I'm 34 years old, and do have dry sensitive acne prone skin, and this has not broke me out (I usually get breakouts immediately if it's a product that doesn't work for my skin) 
Obviously everyone's skin is different, but I really think this is a great product, at least get a sample or try it in store. Really starting to love dermalogica products. I have their hydro blur primer, and multi active toner, both I absolutely love also.
faceoff_positive.headline: This product really blew me away

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product for free to try and review, and I was very excited! Water Gels are quite the rage and living in the Northeast where the wind hurts your face in the winter I was very excited to have a layer of defense. However, as hard as I want to like this product I just can't, and I have been using it for about a month now. Like with any new product, I did notice slight breakouts when I switched. However even after the normal 2 week period I am still noticing clogged pores and blemishes. The gel is also very clinical smelling, it's very potent. It reminds me of walking into an OB/GYN office for some reason, and the smell doesn't dissipate right away, neither does the greasy or wet appearance after putting it on your skin. I normally have to put it on my face and then do something else for about 15 minutes for the product to fully absorb into my skin before putting makeup on, or I notice my makeup running down my face in a few hours even with a primer on. Most importantly, this gel has increased the redness and blotch I was to my uneven skin tone. After a consistent 4 weeks of use I went back to my normal moisturizer because I couldn't continue to see a decline in my skins appearance After I had worked 6 years to clear acne and brighten and even my skin tone.
faceoff_negative.headline: I want to like this, but I can't
